function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of a decentralized peer-to-peer system on information systems among apps and phones","Impact":"Difficulty in protecting user privacy, potential for unauthorized access to sensitive information","Mitigation":"Implement a decentralized peer-to-peer system with strong encryption and authentication measures","Technologies":"Decentralized peer-to-peer systems, cryptography","People":"App administration, Government, Private agencies","Owner":"App developers, Government IT departments, Privacy regulators"},{"Description":"Improper use of Bluetooth receivers in public places for contact mapping of infected patients","Impact":"Ineffective tracing of contacts, potential for false negative results","Mitigation":"Improve the use of GPS location for contact mapping, Implement hybrid system of GPS, cryptography, and Bluetooth low energy technology","Technologies":"GPS, cryptography, Bluetooth low energy technology","People":"Public health decision-makers, Infected patients, General public","Owner":"Public health authorities, App developers, Government agencies"},{"Description":"Use of cryptographic protocols without compromising the privacy and ethics of the patients","Impact":"Potential for unauthorized access to sensitive information, violation of privacy and ethical standards","Mitigation":"Implement periodic encryption, Secure log and user location history with appropriate redactions and safeguards","Technologies":"Cryptography, encryption, secure log","People":"Patients, App administration, Government agencies","Owner":"App developers, Government IT departments"}]}
